891075
wikitext
text/x-wiki
'''Razor's Edge''' was a magical +5 [[longsword]] carried by the evil deity [[Cyric]]. It had the ''[[anarchic]]'', ''[[keen]]'', ''[[screaming]]'', and ''[[wounding]]'' special qualities.
